Located in Ghana's commercial heart, we specialize in manual Pine Script to MQL4/MQL5 conversion that preserves every signal, indicator, and trading logic with 98%+ accuracy. Unlike automated tools that produce buggy code, our experienced developers in Accra Central meticulously translate your TradingView strategies to MetaTrader platforms, ensuring perfect replication of your trading rules. We handle all Pine Script versions (v3, v4, v5, v6), complex multi-timeframe logic, custom functions, and TradingView-specific features. Whether you're trading forex, stocks, or crypto from the Accra CBD, our conversion service gives you the freedom to automate your proven strategies on MT4/MT5 with better broker access and lower costs. Serving professional traders, hedge funds, and financial institutions in Accra Central with dedicated support, comprehensive testing, and full source code delivery.

process.title: Pine Script Analysis & Consultation

process.title: Platform Selection & Planning
process.description: Choose MT4 (MQL4), MT5 (MQL5), or both platforms. We discuss broker compatibility for Ghanaian traders, account types (hedging vs netting), and any platform-specific considerations for Accra Central traders.

process.title: Manual MQL Conversion
process.description: Our developers manually translate every line of Pine Script to optimized MQL4/MQL5 code, preserving all trading logic, indicators, alerts, and visual elements while adding proper MetaTrader order handling.

process.title: Accuracy Testing & Validation
process.description: We rigorously compare signals between TradingView and MetaTrader across multiple timeframes and instruments to ensure 98%+ signal matching. Comprehensive backtesting validates performance parity.

process.title: Delivery & Accra Support
process.description: Receive your converted MT4/MT5 EA with full source code, installation guide, comparison report, and ongoing support from our Accra Central office. We ensure you're fully equipped to trade confidently.

priceRange.note: Simple indicators start at $200, complex multi-indicator strategies $600-$1200. Ghanaian payment options available.

faq.question: How accurate is Pine Script to MQL conversion for Accra traders?
faq.answer: We guarantee 98%+ signal accuracy through manual conversion and comprehensive testing. Unlike automated tools, we ensure your MT4/MT5 EA produces identical signals to your TradingView strategy, validated across multiple instruments popular with Ghanaian traders.

faq.question: Do you support all Pine Script versions used in Ghana?
faq.answer: Yes! We support all Pine Script versions: v3, v4, v5, and the latest v6. Our Accra Central team stays updated with TradingView's evolving syntax and best practices used by international and local traders.

faq.question: Can I get both MT4 and MT5 versions for my strategy?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer dual platform conversion at a discounted rate, giving you maximum flexibility to use your strategy on either MetaTrader platform with brokers serving the Ghanaian market.

faq.question: What if my Pine Script uses premium TradingView indicators?
faq.answer: If you have access to the Pine Script code for all indicators, we can convert them fully. For proprietary indicators without code access, we create equivalent MQL implementations with similar logic and performance.

faq.question: How does this help Accra Central traders specifically?
faq.answer: Our Accra CBD location means easy in-person consultations, understanding of local trading needs, support during Ghanaian business hours, and familiarity with brokers popular among Accra traders. We speak your language, understand your market.

faq.question: Will the EA work exactly like my TradingView strategy?
faq.answer: Yes! We replicate all entry/exit signals, indicator calculations, alerts, and trading logic precisely. The MT4/MT5 EA will perform identically to your TradingView strategy across all tested market conditions.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept in Ghana?
faq.answer: We accept international wire transfer, PayPal, cryptocurrency, and can arrange local Ghanaian payment methods for Accra-based clients. Flexible payment plans available for larger projects.
